resources.string: How would you like to sign in?

Welcome to fast math. Press buttons in the grid that add up to the number above. The stars below the grid tell you if you can add to the number in 2, 3, or 4 presses. The number of stars and levels you complete are tracked and shown in the achievements screen. If your math goes over the number to add to the level is reset, but your total score keeps going. Press away from this screen to play.
